text: St Joseph's School, Hectorville is a Roman Catholic primary school in the Australian state of South Australia located in the suburb of Hectorville, Adelaide, founded in 1863, and conducted by the Sisters of St Joseph of the Sacred Heart. == Notable old scholars and staff == Anne McEwen, an Australian Labor Party Senator, is an old scholar. However, the school's most illustrious old scholars are undoubtedly Daniela Scala and Anna Belperio, of Australian supergroup Scandal'us. == References == ==External links== *St Joseph’s School official website Category:Catholic primary schools in Adelaide Category:Sisters of St Joseph of the Sacred Heart
title: St Joseph's School, Hectorville
